   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Welcome to Lidar_Pipeline's documentation!
==========================================

**Lidar_Pipeline**  is a Python Pipeline library for easily transforming and 
visulizaing lidar point clounds .  It pulls data from the `usgs 3DEP`
 <https://https://www.usgs.gov/>`_ and offers a *simple* and
*intuitive* API.

.. note::

   This project is under active development.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

   usage
   modules
